para: This format provides support for ascii files from Skyforce PC interface for Skymap IIIC, Skymap II (Version 4) and KMD 150. Based on their interface description our module was developed.

Each kind of our basic GPS data (waypoints, routes or tracks) is stored in a seperate file. Thatswhy you need three steps to convert a complex format as GPX or GDB into skyforce.
gpsbabel -i gpx -f file.gpx -o skyforce -w -F waypoints.txt -r -F routes.txt -t -F tracks.txt
